author: duncf
msg: Fix logic error when determining whether to create SSL sockets, also a
few other SSL related cleanups -- changing $opt{'ssl'} to $listen_ssl
now that we can use ssl with --ssl-port and this may not require --ssl.

author: jonesde
msg: Small changes to look at attributes before parameters to allow for overrides; now uses same pattern as elsewhere

author: jonesde
msg: Changed email confirmation service to support new anonymous checkout userlogin request attribute that is used after the session has been cleared
